description: Enterprise techniques used by RDFSNIFFER, ATT&CK software S0416 v1.0
name: RDFSNIFFER (S0416)

techniques.comment: RDFSNIFFER has used several Win32 API functions to interact with the victim machine.[1]
RDFSNIFFER has the capability of deleting local files.[1]
RDFSNIFFER hooks several Win32 API functions to hijack elements of the remote system management user-interface.[1]
